definition: along/to follow (a line, tradition etc)/to carry on/to trim (a border with braid, tape etc)/border/edge
ocean/sea/CL:個|个[ge4],片[pian4]/great number of people or things/(dialect) numerous
-ly/structural particle: used before a verb or adjective, linking it to preceding modifying adverbial adjunct

sentences.english: Saved the meteorological observatory evening to issue the Zhejiang coastal area strong typhoon urgent alarm yesterday.
sentences.chinese: 省气象台昨天傍晚发布浙江沿海地区强台风紧急警报。

sentences.english: Marine fishery is an important activity throughout coastland in Zhejiang province.
sentences.chinese: 海洋渔业是浙江沿海地区的一项重要活动。

sentences.english: This kind of thing in coastal areas used more flooding, many in use.
sentences.chinese: 这种东西在沿海地区使用的比较泛滥，很多老千在用。

sentences.english: Inning of tidal flats is an important approach to keep the amount of field acreage on an appropriate level.
sentences.chinese: 滩涂围垦是沿海地区耕地占补平衡的重要手段。

sentences.english: While several are along the coast, others are due to be located near large cities.
sentences.chinese: 尽管其中一些在沿海地区，其他的将设在大城市附近。

sentences.english: Coastal areas have geographical advantages of industrial development.
sentences.chinese: 沿海地区具有工业集聚的地理优势。

sentences.english: Coastal regions and suburbs of large and medium-sized cities should energetically develop high-efficiency agriculture.
sentences.chinese: 沿海地区和大中城市郊区要大力发展高效农业。

sentences.english: The middle region has integrate superiority to coastal districts.
sentences.chinese: 整体优势呈中部地区强于沿海地区状况。

sentences.english: Some specimens are recovered from coastal locations that are now no longer accessible.
sentences.chinese: 某些标本是从那些现在已不复存在的沿海地区捕获的。

sentences.english: Changes in climate may lead to flooding of the coastal areas.
sentences.chinese: 气候的变化会导致该地沿海地区的洪水泛滥。

sentences.english: These compare the level of water with a reference mark on coastal land.
sentences.chinese: 这些验潮器将海平面与沿海地区的参考标记作比较。

sentences.english: Official efforts to lure manufacturers away from the coast have had mixed results.
sentences.chinese: 政府努力吸引制造企业迁离沿海地区，结果喜忧参半。

sentences.english: The typhoon hit the coastal areas.
The hurricane devastated a large section of the coast.
sentences.chinese: 飓风毁坏了沿海地区的大部分。

sentences.english: But it was in Sendai and adjacent coastal areas that the impact was strongest.
sentences.chinese: 但受地震影响最大的，还是仙台市和附近的沿海地区。

sentences.english: Harmful algal bloom (HAB) is one of the major marine disasters in the coastal areas of Hebei.
sentences.chinese: 赤潮是河北省沿海地区主要海洋生态灾害之一。

definition: local/regional/district (not necessarily formal administrative unit)/region/area/as suffix to city name, means prefecture or county (area administered by a prefecture-level city or county level city)/CL:個|个[ge4]
